schema.title: Add Detail
schema.description: The AI plans further work so that it can add detail to its work.

schema.title: Align
schema.description: The AI aligns shapes to each other on an axis.

schema.title: Bring to Front
schema.description: The AI brings one or more shapes to the front so that they appear in front of everything else.

schema.title: Clear
schema.description: The agent deletes all shapes on the canvas.

schema.title: Count
schema.description: The AI requests to count the number of shapes in the canvas. The answer will be provided to the AI in a follow-up request.

schema.title: Country info
schema.description: The AI gets information about a country by providing its country code, eg: "de" for Germany.

schema.title: Create
schema.description: The AI creates a new shape.

anyOf.title: Draw Shape
anyOf.description: A draw shape is a freeform shape that was drawn by the pen tool. To create new draw shapes, the AI must use the pen event because it gives more control.

anyOf.title: Unknown Shape
anyOf.description: A special shape that is not represented by one of the canvas's core shape types. The AI cannot create these shapes, but it *can* interact with them. eg: The AI can move these shapes. The `subType` property contains the internal name of the shape's type.

schema.title: Delete
schema.description: The AI deletes a shape.

schema.title: Distribute
schema.description: The AI distributes shapes horizontally or vertically.

schema.title: Get inspiration
schema.description: The AI gets inspiration from a random Wikipedia article.

schema.title: Label
schema.description: The AI changes a shape's text.

schema.title: Message
schema.description: The AI sends a message to the user.

schema.title: Move
schema.description: The AI moves a shape to a new position.

schema.title: Pen
schema.description: The AI draws a freeform line with a pen. This is useful for drawing custom paths that are not available with the other available shapes. The "smooth" style will automatically smooth the line between points. The "straight" style will render a straight line between points. The "closed" property will determine if the drawn line gets automatically closed to form a complete shape or not. Remember that the pen will be *down* until the action is over. If you want to lift up the pen, start a new pen action.

schema.title: Place
schema.description: The AI places a shape relative to another shape.

schema.title: Resize
schema.description: The AI resizes one or more shapes, with the resize operation being performed relative to an origin point.

schema.title: Review
schema.description: The AI schedules further work or a review so that it can look at the results of its work so far and take further action, such as reviewing what it has done or taking further steps that would benefit from seeing the results of its work so far.

schema.title: Rotate
schema.description: The AI rotates one or more shapes around an origin point.

schema.title: Send to Back
schema.description: The AI sends one or more shapes to the back so that they appear behind everything else.

schema.title: Set My View
schema.description: The AI changes the bounds of its own viewport to navigate to other areas of the canvas if needed.

schema.title: Stack
schema.description: The AI stacks shapes horizontally or vertically. Note that this doesn't align shapes, it only stacks them along one axis.

schema.title: Think
schema.description: The AI describes its intent or reasoning.

schema.title: Update
schema.description: The AI updates an existing shape.

anyOf.title: Draw Shape
anyOf.description: A draw shape is a freeform shape that was drawn by the pen tool. To create new draw shapes, the AI must use the pen event because it gives more control.

anyOf.title: Unknown Shape
anyOf.description: A special shape that is not represented by one of the canvas's core shape types. The AI cannot create these shapes, but it *can* interact with them. eg: The AI can move these shapes. The `subType` property contains the internal name of the shape's type.

schema.title: Update Todo List
schema.description: The AI updates a current todo list item or creates a new one
